text: Agenda 2025 18.00 - 20.00 Welcome drinks reception 08:00 - 08:50 Registrations and welcome refreshments 08:50 - 08:55 Conference welcome Devina Singh Conference Producer Argus 08:55 - 09.00 Chairperson's opening remarks 09:00 - 09:30 Opening keynote by the French government Speakers Include: Alain Sauvant Inspector general French ministry of the environment - IGEDD 09.30 - 10.00 Argus overview on carbon pricing driving the demand in the market and global significance of the carbon framework - How did industrial slowdown and changes to the EU generation mix influence the market? - How did structural changes to supply and demand affect prices? - How are these factors shaping up to develop this year and beyond? - How did EU and UK ETS prices develop in 2024? Victoria Hatherick Editor, Argus 10:00 - 10:45 Workshop on managing CBAM compliance cost: - How can CBAM data collection and reporting be streamlined for efficiency? - Which strategies help manage and minimize the explicit costs of CBAM? - How can hedging mechanisms provide cost certainty and risk mitigation for CBAM? Nick Osbourne General Manager, Global Environmental Products Shell Daniel Knowles Head of Carbon Market Development and Origination Equinor 14:45 - 15:30 Keynote on sectorial decarbonization: Synergizing carbon market convergence in hard-to-abate industries - Why is the integration of carbon pricing mechanisms with corporate ESG crucial for net zero goals? - Since CO2 prices fluctuate over time, return on investments seems volatile and risky, whatâ€™s the way forward for energy-intensive industries? - Industry (company name) plan: How to pioneer projects in technology, waste management, and other decarbonizing strategies? Speakers Include: Nicola De Sanctis Editor Argus 10:30 - 11:00 Spotlight on COP 29-30 strengths and execution of Article 6: What do you need to know for your business? - How will the framework of Article 6 impact the consistency in the usage of different credits? Michael Kril-Mathres Co-Founder & Chief Marketing Officer ITMO Ltd 11.00 - 11:45 Coffee and networking break 11:45 - 12:30 Get your questions answered by traders and brokers: How to navigate carbon markets - How can we better navigate these and ensure support to buyers in identifying high-quality credits? - What are the key distinctions and synergies between CCP requirements and Verraâ€™s certification standards? - How can the stakeholders integrate CCP and standards into their investment and procurement strategies? 12:30 - 13:15 Flying under CORSIA: How can airlines balance compliance with CORSIA while pursuing own sustainability initiatives and maintaining competitiveness? - Airlines readiness in CORSIA implementation: demand, supply and the obstacles in compliance - What tools are available to better understand and spread awareness? - What role carbon markets and offset projects play in ensuring credibility and effectiveness of CORSIAâ€™s implementation? - How can countries leverage CORSIA to drive investment in SAF and other green technologies?
